pilots.name: DFS-311

shipAbility.name: Networked Calculations
shipAbility.text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship at range 0-1 to change 1 [Focus] result to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

pilots.caption: Scouting Drone
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may transfer 1 of your calculate tokens to another friendly ship at range 0-3.

pilots.name: DFS-081

shipAbility.name: Networked Calculations
shipAbility.text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship at range 0-1 to change 1 [Focus] result to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

pilots.caption: Preservation Programming
pilots.ability: While a friendly ship at range 0-1 defends, it may spend 1 calculate token to change all [Critical Hit] results to [Hit] results.

pilots.name: Precise Hunter

shipAbility.name: Networked Calculations
shipAbility.text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship at range 0-1 to change 1 [Focus] result to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

pilots.caption: Pinpoint Protocols
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack, if the defender is in your [Bullseye Arc], you may reroll 1 blank result.

pilots.name: Separatist Drone
pilots.text: As the Clone Wars escalate, the Separatist Alliance continues to develop the technology of droid starfighters, as well as the tactical droids that command them.

shipAbility.name: Networked Calculations
shipAbility.text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship at range 0-1 to change 1 [Focus] result to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

pilots.name: Haor Chall Prototype

shipAbility.name: Networked Calculations
shipAbility.text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship at range 0-1 to change 1 [Focus] result to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

pilots.caption: Xi Char Offering
pilots.ability: After an enemy ship in your [Bullseye Arc] at range 0-2 declares another friendly ship as the defender, you may perform a [Calculate] or [Lock] action.

pilots.name: Trade Federation Drone
pilots.text: The Trade Federation deployed countless Vulture Droids at the Battle of Naboo, and continues to use these inexpensive starfighters in the Clone Wars.

shipAbility.name: Networked Calculations
shipAbility.text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship at range 0-1 to change 1 [Focus] result to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

pilots.caption: Sinister Automaton
pilots.ability: After you defend, you may spend 1 calculate token to perform an action.

pilots.name: Dark Courier
pilots.text: The vessel called the Scimitar was heavily modified, equipped with stealth technologies and advanced surveillance devices for infiltration and assassination missions.

pilots.name: Darth Maul
pilots.caption: Sith Assassin
pilots.ability: After you perform an attack, you may spend 2 [Force] to perform a bonus primary attack against a different target. If your attack missed, you may perform that bonus primary attack against the same target instead.

pilots.name: Count Dooku
pilots.caption: Darth Tyranus
pilots.ability: After you defend, if the attacker is in your firing arc, you may spend 1 [Force] to remove 1 of your blue or red tokens. After you perform an attack that hits, you may spend 1 [Force] to perform an action.

pilots.name: Captain Sear
pilots.caption: Kage Infiltrator
pilots.ability: While a friendly ship at range 0-3 performs a primary attack, if the defender is in its [Bullseye Arc], before the Neutralize Results step, the friendly ship may spend 1 calculate token to cancel 1 [Evade] result.

pilots.name: Feethan Ottraw Autopilot
pilots.text: Unlike the more disposable fighters it also built for the Separatists, Feethan Ottraw Scalable Assemblies designed the Belbullab-22 with a solid mix of firepower, durability, and speed.

pilots.name: General Grievous
pilots.caption: Ambitious Cyborg
pilots.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if you are not in the defender's firing arc, you may reroll up to 2 attack dice.

pilots.name: Wat Tambor
pilots.caption: Techno Union Foreman
pilots.ability: While you perform a primary attack, you may reroll 1 attack die for each calculating friendly ship at range 1 of the defender.

pilots.name: Skakoan Ace
pilots.text: With its powerful engines, devastating triple laser cannons, and high customizability, the Belbullab-22 is the chosen craft of several elite Separatist Alliance pilots, including the infamous General Grievous.

pilots.name: Techno Union Bomber
pilots.text: Baktoid Armor Workshop developed the Hyena as a strike craft compatible with Trade Federation Vulture swarm tactics.

shipAbility.name: Networked Calculations
shipAbility.text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship at range 0-1 to change 1 [Focus] result to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

pilots.name: Bombardment Drone

shipAbility.name: Networked Calculations
shipAbility.text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship at range 0-1 to change 1 [Focus] result to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

pilots.caption: Time on Target
pilots.ability: If you would drop a device, you may launch that device instead, using the same template.

pilots.name: DBS-404

shipAbility.name: Networked Calculations
shipAbility.text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship at range 0-1 to change 1 [Focus] result to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

pilots.caption: Preservation Protocol Not Found
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack at attack range 1, you must roll 1 additional die. After the attack hits, suffer 1 [Critical Hit] damage.

pilots.name: Baktoid Prototype

shipAbility.name: Networked Calculations
shipAbility.text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship at range 0-1 to change 1 [Focus] result to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

pilots.caption: Function over Form
pilots.ability: While you perform a special attack, if a friendly ship with the Networked Calculations ship ability has a lock on the defender, you may ignore the [Focus], [Calculate], or [Lock] requirement of that attack.

pilots.name: Separatist Bomber
pilots.text: The droid armies of the Separatists are callous to the plight of civilians and make no effort to limit collateral damage.

shipAbility.name: Networked Calculations
shipAbility.text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship at range 0-1 to change 1 [Focus] result to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

pilots.name: DBS-32C

shipAbility.name: Networked Calculations
shipAbility.text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship at range 0-1 to change 1 [Focus] result to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

pilots.caption: Droid Control Signal Relay
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 1 calculate token to perform a [Coordinate] action. You cannot coordinate ships that do not have the Networked Calculations ship ability.

pilots.name: Colicoid Destroyer
pilots.text: Designed by the Colicoid Creation Nest and equipped with powerful tentacles and a massive drill to tear though the hull of even the toughest starships and fortifications, the Trident-class Assault Ship is a terrifying testament to the threat posed by the Separatist Alliance.

shipAbility.name: Tractor Grasp
shipAbility.text: After you perform a Tractor Tentacles attack that hits, the defender gains 1 tractor token.

pilots.name: Colicoid Destroyer
pilots.text: Designed by the Colicoid Creation Nest and equipped with powerful tentacles and a massive drill to tear though the hull of even the toughest starships and fortifications, the Trident-class Assault Ship is a terrifying testament to the threat posed by the Separatist Alliance.

shipAbility.name: Tractor Grasp
shipAbility.text: After you perform a Tractor Tentacles attack that hits, the defender gains 1 tractor token.

pilots.name: Colicoid Destroyer
pilots.text: Designed by the Colicoid Creation Nest and equipped with powerful tentacles and a massive drill to tear though the hull of even the toughest starships and fortifications, the Trident-class Assault Ship is a terrifying testament to the threat posed by the Separatist Alliance.

shipAbility.name: Tractor Grasp
shipAbility.text: After you perform a Tractor Tentacles attack that hits, the defender gains 1 tractor token.

pilots.name: Separatist Privateers
pilots.text: The Separatist Alliance makes use of all manner of unsavory contacts in its fight against the Galactic Republic, including corsairs and criminal cartels.

shipAbility.name: Overdrive Burners
shipAbility.text: While you defend, if your revealed maneuver is speed 3-5, roll 1 additional defense die.
